text: Gilbert Salvador Iberri Garcetti (born August 5, 1941) is an American politician and photographer. He was Los Angeles County's 40th district attorney for two terms, from 1992 until November 7, 2000. He is the father of current Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:American photographers Category:District attorneys Category:Lawyers from Los Angeles Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Gil Garcetti
